recipe

955 calories (Kale/Black Beans/Curry Powder Data Missing)

430 sodium (Kale/Black Beans/Curry Powder Data Missing)

0 cost (Kale/Chilli Oil/Black Beans/Buffalo Sauce/Curry Powder/Brown Rice Data Missing)

0 sugar (Kale/Chilli Oil/Black Beans/Buffalo Sauce/Curry Powder/Brown Rice Data Missing)

0 protein (Kale/Chilli Oil/Black Beans/Buffalo Sauce/Curry Powder/Brown Rice Data Missing)

Vegan Recipe

Estimated Time: 29 Minutes

Put 1 cup Brown Rice in instant pot
Put in 1½ cups Water
Async 24 minutes Pressure cook on high pressure for 15 minutes, (Preheat takes 9 min)
     |- Async 19 minutes Wait
     |-      |-  Put away Brown Rice
     |-      |-  Wash Kale
     |-      |-  Rinse 2 Tbsp Black Beans in sink with strainer (So bean juice doesnt get on counter)
     |- Timer 5 minutes Preheat pan on heat 7
     |- Put in 2 Tbsp Chilli Oil in pan
     |- put Kale in pan
     |- Async 5 minutes Pan sautee kale
     |-      |-  Put kale away
Timer 5 minutes Let instant pot sit without opening steam valve
Open steam valve
Mix in ½ Tbsp Curry Powder into rice
Take inner instant pot bowl out and put on stove. Put away instant pot.
In a bowl mix Black Beans Brown Rice Kale 1½ Tbsp Buffalo Sauce
